value.title: Planning Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: As an IT Professional experienced in SAP solutions, you need to learn about how to leverage Azure resources that include virtual machines, virtual networks, storage accounts, and Azure AD. These modules will give you the Azure knowledge around the reference architecture for SAP Workloads, how to plan for the implementation of SAP solutions on Azure, and the preparation for your migration of SAP workloads to Azure.

topItems.title: Utilize Azure for SAP workloads reference architecture
topItems.excerpt: Utilize Azure for SAP Workloads Reference Architecture

topItems.title: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure

topItems.title: Prepare to migrate SAP workloads to Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module provides details on the important steps prior to deploying SAP workloads to Azure: project preparation and planning, pilot, non-production, production preparation, go live, and post production.

value.title: SC-300 part 3: Implement Access Management for Apps
value.excerpt: SC-300 part 3: Implement Access Management for Apps

value.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
value.excerpt: Discover the Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer tool that enables you to add or modify data. Create stored procedures in JavaScript.

value.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in education that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in financial services
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an AI strategy in financial services that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in government
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in Government that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Dynamically meet changing web app performance requirements with autoscale rules
value.excerpt: Respond to periods of high activity by incrementally adding resources, and then removing these resources when activity drops, to reduce costs.

value.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning to find the best model for your data.

value.title: See Azure in action
value.excerpt: The demos in this module provide an opportunity to see Azure in action.

value.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
value.excerpt: Learn how to create SQL elastic pools and how to use them to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

value.title: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL

value.title: Secure your data with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Secure your data with Azure SQL

value.title: Back up and restore your Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Protect the data in your Azure SQL database and recover from data loss or corruption with backup and restore.

value.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets
value.excerpt: Enable your application to automatically adjust to changes in load while minimizing costs with virtual machine scale sets.

value.title: Build a chat bot with the Azure portal
value.excerpt: Create and test a basic chat bot using the Azure portal

value.title: Build and query a Delta Lake
value.excerpt: Build and query a Delta Lake

value.title: Build reusable Bicep templates by using parameters
value.excerpt: Control and apply parameters to a Bicep template while protecting sensitive inputs.

value.title: Expose multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to assemble multiple Azure Functions into a single API using Azure API Management.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Capture and view page load times in your Azure web app with Application Insights
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll configure Application Insights and use it to study page load data for an Azure web app.

value.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application
value.excerpt: Discover the services and tools available to automate the deployment and configuration of your Azure infrastructure.

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Getting started with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
value.excerpt: CAF getting started. Use the Cloud Adoption Framework getting started guides to unblock your organization’s cloud adoption efforts

value.title: Address tangible risks with the Govern methodology of the Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
value.excerpt: Any technical change introduces risk into your cloud environment. Learn how to evaluate those risks and implement guardrails to keep you safe as you adopt the cloud.

value.title: CAF Plan: Prepare for cloud adoption with a data-driven plan.
value.excerpt: Prepare for cloud adoption with a data driven, cloud adoption plan from CAF. For new innovations, learn from others who have used the target platforms. For migrations, understand how to evaluate your assets and plan the efforts required to move them to the cloud.

value.title: Choose the best Azure landing zone to support your cloud operations requirements
value.excerpt: Azure landing zones help accelerate configuration of your environment to meet your operational requirements.

value.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
